dcterms:creator: Boaz Arad
Ohad Ben-Shahar
Radu Timofte
dcterms:description: The NTIRE2018 dataset contains 256 natural HSIs for training and 5 + 10 additional images for validation and testing. All images are 1392 × 1300 in spatial size and have 31 spectral bands (400-700nm at roughly 10nm increments).
dcterms:title: NTIRE2018

dcterms:creator: Boaz Arad
Radu Timofte
Ohad Ben-Shahar
Yi-Tun Lin
Graham Finlayson
dcterms:description: The NTIRE2020 dataset consists of 450 images for training, 10 images for validation, and 20 images for testing with a spatial resolution of 512 × 482. The band number is also 31.
dcterms:title: NTIRE2020
